title: Fact Check: This video of commando with his dog jumping off a plane is NOT from India | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video of a commando with his dog commando is being shared on social media with a claim that it is from India.

At the time of filing the report, the above post had more than 30,000 shares on Facebook.

ALSO READ: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of Deepika Padukone being injured

NewsMobile fact-checked the above video and found that it is of France’s special forces.

We noticed that the video had the logo of Le monde de Jamy.

We checked for his face and found the original video on his Facebook and YouTube pages.

According to the video caption, the Malinois dog is named Lioda, who is a member of the 1st Marine Infantry Parachute Regiment in the French Army Special Forces Command.

The caption also states that Lioda intervenes in war zones and in the fight against terrorism.

The above information proves that the video is NOT of Indian commandos.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
